thread.title: 'Cubs of the Caliphate': Rehabilitating I.S. child fighters

title: 'Cubs of the Caliphate': Rehabilitating I.S. child fighters
text:
'Cubs of the Caliphate': Rehabilitating I.S. child fighters Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 01:46 
Naif Jardo Qassim says he wasn't emotionally prepared to listen to the stories of boys and girls as their only therapist at a center for former children conscripted by Islamic State. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
